description: This file defines a Python class 'BaiduSearchTools' that provides a toolkit for performing Baidu searches, including initialization with optional parameters and a method to execute searches and format results as JSON.

classes.name: BaiduSearchTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for searching Baidu with configurable options, inheriting from 'Toolkit'.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Constructor to initialize BaiduSearchTools with optional parameters such as max results, language, headers, proxy, timeout, and debug flag.

methods.name: baidu_search
methods.description: Performs a Baidu search with the given query, optional max_results and language, returning search results formatted as a JSON string.
